hero.title: Schedule App is for
hero.description: The modern scheduling solution that helps you manage your time, appointments, and tasks with ease. Built for teams and individuals who value efficiency.

features.title: Everything you need to stay organized
features.subtitle: Powerful features designed to make scheduling effortless

items.title: Lightning Fast
items.description: Built with modern technologies for instant performance and seamless user experience.

items.title: Secure & Reliable
items.description: Your data is protected with enterprise-grade security and regular backups.

items.title: Beautiful Design
items.description: Enjoy a modern, intuitive interface that makes scheduling a pleasure, not a chore.

before.title: Before Schedule App
items: Answering phone calls all day to book appointments
Clients calling to reschedule or cancel

with.title: With Schedule App
items: Clients book online 24/7 through your mini website
Automatic conflict detection prevents double bookings
Clients can reschedule or cancel themselves
Email reminders sent automatically to reduce no-shows
Seamless Google Calendar sync keeps everything in one place

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that works for you

plan.name: Appointments
plan.description: Manage your schedule and bookings easily online

finalCta.title: Ready to get started?
finalCta.description: Join thousands of users who are already scheduling smarter
